title: Lynda - Acrobat X: Creating Forms
description:
This course demonstrates how to design a form from scratch in Word, Illustrator, or InDesignÃ¢â‚¬â€or from an existing electronic document. author Claudia McCue teaches how to add interactive fields like check boxes, buttons, drop-down lists, and digital signature fields; how to add field calculations like sum or average; and how to use JavaScript for more advanced calculations. The course also covers how to enable forms for Acrobat Reader users, add security to a form, distribute it via email or the web, and collect data from recipients.
Topics include:
Designing forms in multiple applications
Creating and editing fields
Using auto-recognition
Adding buttons and check boxes
Creating and adding artwork
Performing math in a form
Creating an order form
Securing forms with passwords and digital signatures
Distributing forms via email or Acrobat.com
